import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './Settings.css'; const Settings = ({ apiKey, setApiKey, isApiKeySet, setIsApiKeySet, onClose, testApiKey, isTestingApi, apiTestResult, onSaveApiKey, // Added ElevenLabs props elevenLabsApiKey, setElevenLabsApiKey, isVoiceEnabled, setIsVoiceEnabled, testElevenLabsApiKey, isTestingElevenLabsApi, elevenLabsApiTestResult }) => { const [localApiKey, setLocalApiKey] = useState(apiKey); const [showApiKey, setShowApiKey] = useState(false); // Add ElevenLabs state const [localElevenLabsApiKey, setLocalElevenLabsApiKey] = useState(elevenLabsApiKey || ''); const [showElevenLabsApiKey, setShowElevenLabsApiKey] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { setLocalApiKey(apiKey); setLocalElevenLabsApiKey(elevenLabsApiKey || ''); }, [apiKey, elevenLabsApiKey]); const handleSaveApiKey = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onSaveApiKey(localApiKey); }; // Add handler for ElevenLabs API key const handleSaveElevenLabsApiKey = () => { localStorage.setItem('elevenlabs_api_key', localElevenLabsApiKey); setElevenLabsApiKey(localElevenLabsApiKey); }; return (

Settings

Gemini API Setup

Enter your Gemini API key to use with NarrativeForge. You can get a key from the Google AI Studio.

setLocalApiKey(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your API key" autoComplete="off" />
{apiTestResult && (

{apiTestResult.message}

{apiTestResult.success && apiTestResult.response && (
Model response:

{apiTestResult.response.substring(0, 100)}...

)}
)}
{/* Add ElevenLabs section */}

Voice Settings (ElevenLabs)

Add voice to your roleplays with ElevenLabs. Get your API key from ElevenLabs.

setLocalElevenLabsApiKey(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your ElevenLabs API key" autoComplete="off" />
{elevenLabsApiTestResult && (

{elevenLabsApiTestResult.message}

)}

When enabled, AI responses will be read aloud using ElevenLabs TTS.

About NarrativeForge

NarrativeForge is a character-driven roleplay application created by Ryan Morrison. Create immersive storytelling experiences with detailed characters and scenarios.

Version 1.0.0

); }; export default Settings;
